page.title: 14THE YOUNG FOLK IN BRAILES
page.content: In our village there are several activities for young people.Brailes Silver Band gives them an opportunity to learn a brass instrument.The band rehearses twice a week in the Free School and it often plays at local events.There is also a junior section of the Badminton Club,which meets in the Village Hall. Three of the groups meet at the Old School;the Cubs on Monday,the Guides on Wedenesday and the Brownies on Thursday.They play games,work for badges and go camping. Some people belong to the church choir which practises every Friday. After the service on Sunday morning young children attend the Seekers Club. On Wednesday older boys and girls go to the Young Peoples Fellowship.
